H0.text: Which optical toy was first patented in 1817 by David Brewster. Stereoscope

H1.text: Which optical toy was first patented in 1817 by David Brewster. Praxinoscope

H2.text: Which optical toy was first patented in 1817 by David Brewster. Zoetrope

H3.text: Which optical toy was first patented in 1817 by David Brewster. Kalidescope

A4.text: British patent no. 4136 'for a new Optical Instrument called 'The Kaleidoscope'... was granted in July 1817.

A5.text: The term 'kaleidoscope' was coined by its Scottish inventor David Brewster.
